entries.title: Donald Trump demands Google face criminal prosecution for search results he claims are biased toward Kamala Harris
entries.summary: Trump says Google has been 'illegally' using a system that only displays 'bad stories' about him and called for it to face Justice prosecution.

entries.title: Shock poll shows Donald Trump with a substantial lead in critical swing state
entries.summary: Trump leads Kamala Harris 48 to 42, in the new USA Today / Suffolk University poll in Arizona, a key presidential battleground. He has edged Harris in a series of polls there.

entries.title: My Taylor Swift tickets were stolen from my Ticketmaster account and they refused to help me

entries.title: Chappell Roan CANCELS music festival appearances after backlash over 'not endorsing' Kamala Harris
entries.summary: Chappell Roan has canceled a pair of music festival appearances this weekend  - after being hit with backlash over 'not endorsing' Kamala Harris in the US Presidential Election.

entries.title: Doctors issue warning about using baby oil in the bedroom after Diddy sex trafficking scandal
entries.summary: Amid reports of Sean 'Diddy' Combs having 1,000 bottles of baby oil, urologists told DailyMail.com that using it during sex could lead to broken condoms, irritation, and deadly infections.
